H3.text: On this day, April 17th, in 1984, during an infamous incident in London, the murder of which person toolk place which has had long term political implications. YVONNE FLETCHER

A4.text: The murder of Yvonne Fletcher, a Metropolitan Police officer, occurred on 17 April 1984, when she was fatally wounded by a shot fired from the Libyan embassy on St James's Square, London, by an unknown gunman.

A5.text: Yvonne Fletcher was a Metropolitan Police officer.
